code: /*----- Importaciones y dependencias -----*/import React,{useContext,useEffect}from'react';import ReactDOM from'react-dom/client';import{BrowserRouter,useNavigate,Routes,Route}from'react-router-dom';import{AppContextProvider}from'./scripts/app_context';import{AppContext}from'./scripts/app_context';/*----- Componentes -----*/import{LandingScreen}from'./components/landing_screen';import{AuthScreen}from'./components/auth_screen';import{AppScreen}from'./components/app_screen';/*----- Componente principal -----*/import{jsx as _jsx,Fragment as _Fragment,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MainBody=()=>{const{auth}=useContext(AppContext);const navigate=useNavigate();let current_url=window.location.pathname;useEffect(()=>{if(!auth&&current_url!=='/login'&&current_url!=='/'){navigate('/login');}else if(auth&&current_url==='/login'){navigate('/app/feed');}},[auth,navigate]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LandingScreen,{})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/login",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AuthScreen,{})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/app/*",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AppScreen,{})})})]});};ReactDOM.createRoot(document.getElementById('app__mount')).render(/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AppContextProvider,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BrowserRouter,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MainBody,{})})}));
